entry.title: Russia Hits Grain Terminals in Latest Attack on Ukraine's Food Infrastructure
entry.content: Russian forces targeted at least two large North American-owned grain terminals in the port of Mykolaiv, as part of what Kyiv and Western governments say is a campaign to degrade Ukraineâ€™s ability to export food.

entry.title: Cracks Emerge in U.K. System for Hosting Ukrainian Refugees
entry.content: Tens of thousands of Ukrainians who fled the Russian invasion are staying in British homes, but as the war drags on the reality for guests and hosts is setting in.
